name: at-profile
title: @ Profile
description: Quickly open profiles on social platforms.
author: chrismessina

commands.name: quick-open
commands.title: Open Profile
commands.subtitle: @ Profile
commands.description: Quickly open a profile on a social site

commands.name: manage-apps
commands.title: Manage Apps
commands.subtitle: @ Profile
commands.description: Manage social apps and add custom platforms

tools.name: open
tools.title: Open Profile
tools.description: Quickly open a profile on a social site

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
